attributes.action: to apply for EU farming subsides to also to apply to the virtual farming application Farmville
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the French are allowed to apply for EU farming subsides to leave fields fallow, then there is no reason not to apply the same subsides to UK farms that are hosted within the Facebook application called Farmville.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
